titleStmt.title: An act for subscribing the engagement. Die Mercurii, 2 Januarii, 1649. Ordered by the Parliament, that this act be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field for Edward Husband, printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: On 6F2: the last word of first line of text: 'dis-af-'; first word of line below initial: 'preventing'; last word of last full line of text: 'following'.
Also issued as part of a through-paged folio set with a table for the entire set added.
Ornament on t.p.; initial letter; text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
